name: Rain (itch) (kaelynmauve)
description:
Rain is a piece of short fiction written by me. I recently started learning how to code in html and css, so I decided to turn my story into a more complete experience with images and audio as practice.

Download rain.zip, extract the files within and click on index.html to open it in your browser.

Unfortunately, I couldn't get sound files to auto-play in the browser no matter what I tried, so I worked around the problem by including a link in the html page to a website that loops background music (please click to play the soundtrack for the best experience!).
